press_camera_button.description: Press the button on the camera.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure proper functioning.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob on the camera.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure smooth rotation.

clean_camera_body.description: Clean the camera body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_camera.description: Clean the entire camera including the body, button, and knob.
